document.full_text: the most powerful pro-business voice in brazil's government resigned on tuesday following a scandal over his sudden enrichment, prompting worries on wall street that his departure could herald a leftward drift in economic policy.
document.title: powerful brazil chief of staff resigns after scandal
lines_and_colors: the most powerful pro-business voice in brazil's government resigned on tuesday following a scandal over his sudden enrichment, prompting worries on wall street that his departure could herald a leftward drift in economic policy.
